title: Create RACE TRACK-hosted-racing-event Relationship
description:
* The relationship ›hosted-racing-event‹ is created when the provided IDs of the RACE TRACK and RACING EVENT are valid. -> Status Code \`201\`
* A successful request returns the ID of the created relationship, the relationship name and the relationship partner.
* Requests with invalid IDs are rejected. This can happen when there exist no nodes with the given IDs or when those nodes are from the wrong type. -> Status Code \`404\`
* The same ›hosted-racing-event‹ relationship between the same nodes can only be created once. Attempts to recreate them will be ignored. -> Status Code \`304\`
* Each RACE TRACK can be in a ›hosted-racing-event‹ relationship with multiple RACING EVENTS
